name: Galarian Articuno
flavorText: Known as Articuno, this Pokémon fires beams that can immobilize opponents as if they had been frozen solid.

abilities.name: Cruel Charge
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may attach up to 2 Psychic Energy cards from your hand to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psylaser
attacks.text: Discard all Psychic Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
